title: Champs that are alike
body: Firstly I love Fiora, but hate Irelia so fkn much. What are some other (Gameplay) features that are replicated in 2 or more champs.

replies.body:
how about maokai and this tree
i think yes ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

LOL THIS GUY
it is like you are a weird teacher asking a 3rd grade class to compare two champions for homework, then you take their work home and drool all over it working how to gain op freelo

> [{quoted}](name=Samurai Jin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8Fe3yiun,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:39:38.337+0000)
>
> it is like you are a weird teacher asking a 3rd grade class to compare two champions for homework, then you take their work home and drool all over it working how to gain op freelo

That makes no sense at all, you must be Corki 9/11 (one of smurfs) or you are just stupid. Me asking a simple question isnt like your Lewdness, Plz be somewhat normal before posting stupid shit.
Fiora is more of a copy of Yi instead of Irelia, if anything.

Katarina - Akali (Throw Q, dash in, swirl knives, press other buttons, manaless instakill)
Ziggs - Xerath (Massive damage long range Q with tiny cooldown, Global ult)
Zed - LeBlanc (Massive damage, very tricksy, cant be attacked for a small window, use clones)

tbh i hate all of them except Xerath, but even he needs his Q indicator made more accurate or put on a slightly longer CD
and Ziggs isn't too bad..

>tbh i hate all of them except Xerath, but even he needs his Q indicator made more accurate or put on a slightly longer CD

If you've played against a Xerath any time within this century you'll find that his indicator is just as inaccurate as every indicator in the game is, it's slightly larger, but this is the case with nearly every ability, it's just because it's one that is much more spamable then the other ones that it gets any sort of bad rap. (nearly every indicator in the game is wrong if your going for accuracy down to the millimeter.)
Lmao you ever played Leblanc? I miss E by 80 miles nek minnit it still hits xD not as fun when youre on the recieving end tho lolol

So in other words, i'm right that every indicator is in the game is wrong?

So your comment is without meaning.

fair

Sejuani + Gragas: Both have low cd dash that applies knockup (sej Q, grag E), both have %hp damage on aa (both W), both have AoE slow (sej E grag Q) and large AoE crowd control ults. they also benefit from building exactly the same items.
Xin and Aatrox are somewhat similar, both having healing on every 3rd auto, a longrange dash/knockup and ults that deal AoE damage and give them bonuses based on how many enemies get hit.

Kog'Maw & Corki? They have AP ratios and have long-range abilities

Also you could argue that Ashe & Jinx are alike. Lots of CC with longer-than-average range and global ults.

I'm also going to go out on a limb here an make a joke with...

{{champion:83}} & {{champion:3}}

Vi and J4 are the same champion.

So are Amumu and Sejuani
